div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2322 Tortosa, 1863 (1122, 209?) Burial: 240 B.C. (Guadan) Contents: 6 AR Emporiae: 2 dr. Rhoda: 3 dr. Ebusus: 1 didr. Disposition: unknown Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, pp. 144-5 de Guadan, Numisma 16 (1955), p. 14; MPER, pp. 79-80 In the opinion of Zobel, the hd. from the mines of Cartagena (Noe 209, cf. de Guadan MPER, pp. 87-8) was part of this hd.
